snippet: Fiona Reid was chief financial officer of the 2009 Bloomberg re-election campaign, from which, prosecutors say, John F. Haggerty Jr. stole $1.1 million.
lead_paragraph: Fiona Reid was chief financial officer of the 2009 Bloomberg re-election campaign, from which, prosecutors say, John F. Haggerty Jr. stole $1.1 million.

headline.main: In a Trial, Only a Quick Nod to a Bloomberg Aide’s Affair
headline.print_headline: In Trial, Only a Quick Nod to a Bloomberg Aide’s Affair
headline.seo: Bloomberg Aide Tells Jury of Affair With Haggerty
